Articles.Content:
The Sith is pleased to announce that a solar system mod is in the works by their top engineers.

Please note that the mod is still in the early stages of development. More information will come as the mod develops. If you have any guidance please PM me.
Check out our thread in the Add-on Development section for more info!

It'd be helpful if you actually posted what the mod is.

Edited July 23, 2013 by swiftgates24

I couldn't find your Addon Development thread, but I did find this thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41529-Sith-s-Solar-System-Mod?p=534655#post534655

If you have any guidance please PM me.

Do you actually have any idea what you want to do in this mod?
i assume your waiting for the release of kragathea's mod?

To #4:

Maybe it is this one: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36293-Planets-and-ScaledSpace

As far as I know he/she/it is the only one to ever make a working planet mod in KSP. Watch the video in this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36293-Planets-and-ScaledSpace/page40?p=526676#post526676

I don't know if they are the same team, but I would guess they are, though.

I don't know if they are the same team, but I would guess they are, though.

I would guess they aren't:

Well this is a bit awkward. I'm also working on a solar system mod. I've looked around and I really like this mod. But I do have to say my mod will be a bit more realistic. Please keep my updated on this mod though
I don't think they have any idea how to make a mod, considering they keep asking for help and don't even have a dev thread. Anyone else?

Swiftgate, I assume you read what the post says. It says the add-on is in heavy development.

And to anyone else. One of the stars and a couple planets are already modeled. I'm posting more information soon.

Then can you post some information on what the mod is, the only place you have have it isn't even in your own thread. That should be automatic. You can't just post a mod saying "I'm making it, but you don't get to know what it is".
Look at my development thread. In a couple hours I will be posting the first looks at it. I just have to finish a couple things to make the planets look a bit better.
There is nothing there. Something now would be useful. I don't need screenshots, I don't need video, I don't need a dev update, I just need a description of the mod.
Ok well I just added some stuff there.
I'm am more than willing to do whatever you guys want. Just tell me what it is.
The dev thread has as little info as this one does....just someone else trying to take attention away from the work Krag is doing.....
I don't want to take anything away from him. I just want to make this mod for myself and whoever else would like it. I just stumbled apron his idea after I posted this.

An idea is to team up with the guy(s) who made the 'Interstellar" mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-22-KSP-Interstellar-(Science-Integration-Heat-Mechanics)-Version-0-7-4-(Beta) and have the warp drive power transport to other solar systems.
